Address.label: Address
Address.value: 300 LINDENWOOD DRIVE,VALLEYBROOKE CORPORATE CENTER, MALVERN, Pennsylvania, 19355-1740, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ecovyst Inc is a provider of catalysts, speciality materials, chemicals, and services that enable environmental improvements, enhance consumer products and increase personal safety. It manufactures speciality inorganic performance chemicals, speciality catalysts, and speciality glass materials. It sells products in the United States and other countries. Its operating segments are Ecoservices and Catalyst Technologies.
